projects.title: My newest projects
projects.titleContribute: Projects, I am a part of

AI.title: Artificial intelligence algorithms
AI.description: My implementations of different AI algorithms, containing a genetic algorithm responsible for planning point connections on a PCB board, graph coloring algorithm and other solutions. Everything's written in Python.

Learningbox.title: LearningBox
Learningbox.description: A landing page for an online teaching company made to practice different functionalities offered by SASS preprocessor.

portfolio.title: Personal portfolio website
portfolio.description: My personal website written in Vue.js, based on mockups, that I prepared in Figma.

cityEco.title: CityEcoView
cityEco.description: Since September 2020, I've been lucky to work on this amazing project with a group of inspiring and dedicated people. The frontend part of the application, which I've been working on, is written in Angular9 alongside Ionic Framework. To read more about the idea behind the app, visit CityEcoView website.

quizly.title: Quizly
quizly.description: An application, that I, together with my friend Bartek, built as an assignment for Advanced Web Systems course. It allows users to solve quizzes together with their friends in real time. The frontend part, written in Vue.js, is based on mockups I prepared. A small Socket.io server is responsible for managing game rooms and users inside of them.

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Who am I?
about.description: My name is Szymon Bednarski and I am a Computer Science student at Wroclaw University of Science and Technology. As a 3rd year student, I'm on the verge of getting a bachelor's degree. Despite being sceptic at first, together with my skills growth, I fell in love with web development and decided, that I want to do it for a living. Besides that, I love playing the piano and I'm a huge boxing fan. I cannot accept any winter without a ski trip :)
